001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.hilt;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import com.google.gson.Gson;
005import com.google.gson.GsonBuilder;
006import com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer;
007import dagger.Module;
008import dagger.Provides;
009import dagger.hilt.InstallIn;
010import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
011import dagger.hilt.components.SingletonComponent;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.R;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.service.ApodProxyService;
014import java.time.LocalDate;
015import javax.inject.Singleton;
016import okhttp3.Interceptor;
017import okhttp3.OkHttpClient;
018import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor;
019import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level;
020import retrofit2.Retrofit;
021import retrofit2.adapter.rxjava3.RxJava3CallAdapterFactory;
022import retrofit2.converter.gson.GsonConverterFactory;
023
024@Module
025@InstallIn(SingletonComponent.class)
026public class ProxyModule {
027
028  @Provides
029  @Singleton
030  Gson provideGson() {
031    return new GsonBuilder()
032        .excludeFieldsWithoutExposeAnnotation()
033        .registerTypeAdapter(LocalDate.class, (JsonDeserializer<LocalDate>)
034            (element, type, context) -> LocalDate.parse(element.getAsString()))
035        .create();
036  }
037
038  @Provides
039  @Singleton
040  Interceptor provideInterceptor(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
041    return new HttpLoggingInterceptor()
042        .setLevel(Level.valueOf(context.getString(R.string.log_level).toUpperCase()));
043  }
044
045  @Provides
046  @Singleton
047  OkHttpClient provideClient(Interceptor interceptor) {
048    return new OkHttpClient.Builder()
049        .addInterceptor(interceptor)
050        .build();
051  }
052
053  @Provides
054  @Singleton
055  ApodProxyService provideProxy(
056      @ApplicationContext Context context, Gson gson, OkHttpClient client) {
057    return new Retrofit.Builder()
058        .client(client)
059        .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create(gson))
060        .addCallAdapterFactory(RxJava3CallAdapterFactory.create())
061        .baseUrl(context.getString(R.string.base_url))
062        .build()
063        .create(ApodProxyService.class);
064  }
065
066}
